模块 davidchangx.charpuz
程序包 xyz.davidchangx.puzzle

类 Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.davidchangx.puzzle.Generator
  • public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    The puzzle generator. This puzzle generator uses dictionary in form like TreeMap<Character,TreeMap<String,Integer>>. The Character is needed as possible common character of several strings. The is considered as the string. The Integer is the position of the character in this string. So this structure means, a specific charater is in a string, and it is on the position of index .
    版本:
    1.2
    作者:
    David Chang

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      修饰符和类型 类 说明
      class  Generator.StringStatus
      Stores the status of a string like horizontal or vertical coordinates and etc during dfs.

      Constructs a puzzle generator with given dictionary.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Generator

        public Generator​(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> dictionary)
        Constructs a puzzle generator with given dictionary.
        参数:
        dictionary - the dictionary in need

    • 方法详细资料

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int width,
                    int height)
        Set the size of the target puzzle and clear the previous result remained. Our puzzle generation method won't clear the generation result (so that the invoker can get the result for times after generation). So it's necessary for the invoker to invoke this method first to guarantee that the result of the last generation should be cleared when he wants to generate a new puzzle using generate(), or unpredictable result may occur.
        参数:
        width - the width of target puzzle
        height - the height of target puzzle

      • setDictionary

        public void setDictionary​(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> dictionary)
        Change the dictionary used for generation. Generator never create a copy of the dictionary, it simply get the reference of the dictionary object and use it. About the dictionary's structure, please refer to Generator.
        参数:
        dictionary - the new dictionary

      • generate

        public boolean generate()
        Generates a puzzle.
        返回:
        if the generation succeeds

      • getMap

        public char[][] getMap()
        Get the puzzle in form of char[][] or null if last generation has failed.
        返回:
        the puzzle in form of char[][] or null if last generation has failed

      • getIdiomList

        public Generator.StringStatus[] getIdiomList()
        Returns the puzzle in form of list of Generator.StringStatus. If the last generation has failed, the returned list will be empty. If the list is not empty, the invoker may use the list of Generator.StringStatus to generate a proper form of puzzle by itself.
        返回:
        the list of Generator.StringStatus
